mapper.select: SELECT l.repayment_time as repaymentTime FROM t_loan_bill l WHERE l.bid_id=#{bidId}
SELECT va as vaCodel,MAX(va_create_time) as createTime,mode from t_loan_user_transaction_repay WHERE transaction_id=#{id}

SELECT va AS vaCodel,va_create_time AS createTime,transaction_id,MODE FROM t_loan_user_transaction_repay GROUP BY id HAVING (TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,MAX(va_create_time),NOW())) <=6 AND transaction_id = #{payId} AND MODE = #{mode}
SELECT t.payment_id AS transactionId, t.amount AS price, t.bank AS bankType from t_loan_user_transaction t where t.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_loan_user_transaction_repay set status=#{b} where transaction_id=#{id}
